MyServices.title: Azure Cloud Management
MyServices.description: Managing and monitoring Microsoft Azure resources to ensure high availability, scalability, and optimal performance.

MyServices.title: Virtual Machines Administration
MyServices.description: Deploying, configuring, and maintaining Azure Virtual Machines for secure and reliable workloads.

MyServices.title: Cloud Networking
MyServices.description: Configuring Azure Virtual Networks, subnets, NSGs, and VPN connections to ensure secure cloud communication.

MyServices.title: Security & Identity Management
MyServices.description: Managing Azure Active Directory, role-based access control (RBAC), and implementing cloud security best practices.

MyServices.title: Monitoring & Performance Optimization
MyServices.description: Monitoring cloud resources using Azure Monitor and Log Analytics to improve performance and reduce downtime.

MyServices.title: Backup & Disaster Recovery
MyServices.description: Implementing backup strategies and disaster recovery solutions to protect data and ensure business continuity.
